attributes.additional_details:
All over Europe Gypsies (who are are an ethnic race NOT a lifestyle) are having their human rights violated. In Kosovo Gypsies are located to dangerous and poisonous lead mines, in Hungary they are being killed, Italy is burning Gypsy families, and even Britain plays a role in its newspaper and tabloid bid to whip up hate and racism.
An EU-ROMA policy would FORCE the EU member states not to socially and politically exclude Roma Gypsies on the sufferance of heavy sanctions.

.
